titleStmt.title: The character of a popish successour, and what England may expect from such a one humbly offered to the consideration of both Houses of Parliament, appointed to meet at Oxford, on the one and twentieth of March, 1680/1.
titleStmt.author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
In reference to the succession of the Duke of York, afterwards, James II.
